thread.title: Kansas’ new player housing is way nicer than your dorm
thread.title_full: Kansas’ new player housing is way nicer than your dorm

author: Extra Mustard
title: Kansas’ new player housing is way nicer than your dorm
text:
Kansas’ new player housing is way nicer than your dorm Sports Illustrated 3 hrs ago Extra Mustard © Sports Illustrated Kansas’s new basketball dorms are amazing Kansas has a new housing complex for the men’s and women’s basketball teams and they look a whole lot nicer than the standard dorms many students have come to know and loathe.
AdChoices The $17.5 million apartments can hold up to 32 students and features a half court, a rooftop lounge, and a barber shop, according to photos from ESPN’s Jeff Goodman.
• Watch:LeBron James makes cameo in Survivor’s Remorse
The new housing is slated to host its first group of students in the 2016-’17 school year, according to The Wichita Eagle.
Go to MSN Home
